00046 #ifndef _RTAI_ASM_I386_XNATOMIC_H
00047 #define _RTAI_ASM_I386_XNATOMIC_H
00048 
00049 #include <asm/rtai_atomic.h>
00050 
00051 typedef atomic_t atomic_counter_t;
00052 typedef unsigned long atomic_flags_t;
00053 
00054 #define xnarch_memory_barrier()                /* UP-only */
00055 #define xnarch_atomic_set(pcounter,i)          atomic_set(pcounter,i)
00056 #define xnarch_atomic_get(pcounter)            atomic_read(pcounter)
00057 #define xnarch_atomic_inc(pcounter)            atomic_inc(pcounter)
00058 #define xnarch_atomic_dec(pcounter)            atomic_dec(pcounter)
00059 #define xnarch_atomic_inc_and_test(pcounter)   atomic_inc_and_test(pcounter)
00060 #define xnarch_atomic_dec_and_test(pcounter)   atomic_dec_and_test(pcounter)
00061 #define xnarch_atomic_set_mask(pflags,mask)    atomic_set_mask(mask,pflags)
00062 #define xnarch_atomic_clear_mask(pflags,mask)  atomic_clear_mask(mask,pflags)
00063 
00064 #define xnarch_atomic_xchg(ptr,x) atomic_xchg(ptr,x)
00065 
00066 #endif /* !_RTAI_ASM_I386_XNATOMIC_H */
